original_title: Bob Dylan: 1978-1989 - Both Ends of the Rainbow
overview: Documentary profile of Dylan's career during one of his most controversial periods - his Christian fundamentalist phase. The period covered runs from late 1978 through to what many regard as his return to form - 1989's 'Oh Mercy' - and includes rare Dylan footage alongside live and studio versions of his most pivotal songs.
title: Bob Dylan: 1978-1989 - Both Ends of the Rainbow
